title: The Municipal Commissioner shall pass the reasoned order for the aforesaid changes and intimate the same along with certified copy of plan to the Director of Town Planning, Pune & State Govt
clause_text: The Municipal Commissioner shall pass the reasoned order for the aforesaid changes and intimate the same along with certified copy of plan to the Director of Town Planning, Pune & State Govt. Provided that no such shifting of existing amenity /reservation shall be permissible
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Municipal Commissioner shall pass the reasoned order for the aforesaid changes and intimate the same along with certified copy of plan to the Director of Town Planning, Pune & State Govt.
